name: Gunner Runner
description:
This is Gunner Runner, a game were you cant stop shooting.

So far there are  2 Levels and a boss.

Use [WASD] to move.

Portal shoot or run into it to get to the next level

Bomb if you hit it ,you die

Turret it shoots dangerous bullets at you

Instructions

Extract the Game folder

open the extracted folder

open the game folder 

open Gunner Runner folder

open Runner Gunner.exe

if you have questions please use comments
